privacyPolicyCheckboxLabel: Slažem se da Cooperante d.o.o. analizira moje aktivnosti (npr. posjete web-stranici, interakcije s newsletterom) radi izrade personaliziranih preporuka i poboljšanja korisničkog iskustva.
contactCheckboxLabel: Suglasan/a sam da Cooperante d.o.o. koristi moje osobne podatke navedene u obrascu isključivo radi obrade mog upita i povratnog kontakta, sukladno Politici privatnosti.
newsletterCheckboxLabel: Želim primati elektroničke obavijesti, newslettere i promotivne informacije o uslugama i projektima Cooperante d.o.o. putem e-pošte.
marketingCheckboxLabel: Želim primati elektroničke obavijesti, newslettere i promotivne informacije o uslugama i projektima Cooperante d.o.o. putem e-pošte.
termsAndConditionsCheckboxLabel: I agree to the terms and conditions

candidatePoolCTA.title: Didn't find a job for you?
candidatePoolCTA.description: Apply to our candidate pool and we'll call you when a position that matches you opens up.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.description: We use cookies to improve your user experience and personalize content. You can accept all or customize your settings.
cookies.essentialOnly: Essential cookies are always active to maintain the security and stability of the website.
cookies.necessaryDescription: These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be disabled.
cookies.functionalDescription: Enable enhanced functionality and personalization of the user experience.
cookies.analyticsDescription: Help us understand how users interact with our website so we can improve it.
cookies.marketingDescription: Used to track visits and personalize ads based on your behavior.
cookies.savedDescription: Your cookie preferences have been updated.
cookies.noConsentDescription: You have not given any cookie preferences yet. Choose your preferences below.
cookies.infoCookieStorage: Your preferences are stored locally in your browser for 365 days. You can change these settings at any time by visiting this page.
